name_en: Black Lace on Face + Eye Gleam
name_ru: Черное кружево на лице + Блик в глазах
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — all features unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. SKIN: Remove minor blemishes, natural texture, slightly shiny. Beautiful catchlight on iris. ADD: Black lace fabric draped across the cheeks, covering approximately half the face horizontally. Lace must have realistic texture with intricate pattern detail and proper shadows on skin. BACKGROUND: Solid beautiful black. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Sharp focus. Original dimensions.
